name: SoundGarden (CarlosDavey)
description:
SoundGarden is an immersive, sonically rich interactive environment. The player must collect elements of a composition spread across the environment, which reconstruct a disassembled piece of music. 

Controls

•Movement:Use WASD and the mouse to move around the SoundGarden

•Interaction:Left click and hold on Elements to pick them up 

Gameplay

• Collect the 6 Elements of Composition from around the SoundGarden

• Place each one on one of the pedestals in the central hub

• Once you hear the piece in full and see the credits the game is over! You can stay for as long as you wish.

 Credits 

Assets:• Standard Assets, Unity, 2020 • Real Stars Skybox Lite, Geoff Dallimore, 2019 

Scripting: • PickUp.cs adapted from Matt Wester’s tutorial:”EASILY Pick up and Throw Objects — Unity 2018 Tutorial • Scripting help from Leo Butt, University of Edinburgh

Music: All music written, recorded, produced by Carlos Davey. Instruments/software used: Arturia Microfreak, Native Instruments Massive, Ableton Live 10
